products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Willow Roller Blind
products.description: Drawing from nature, this linear leaf print impresses a timeless style in a modern and impactful way. The boheme willow double sided blackout roller blind will make a cool and convenient update to your home thanks to its effective blackout material and bold double sided print that can be admired from outside too. The muted willow green tone will exude a soft and soothing effect that can be used to accent your overall home style.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Summer Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: The warm, golden hues of this roller blind will definitely catch the eye. Boheme pvc blackout summer yellow blind is the ideal way to add a splash of colour to your favourite room. With a fabulously modern geometrical leaf design outlined in white, it's a cheerful window dressing that will stand the test of time. Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Steel Roller Blind
products.description: Make a contemporary impact on your home decor with the boheme steel double sided blackout roller blind. The simple yet bold effect of this leaf print motif is depicted on both sides of this tough, pvc roller blind, reflecting your funky interior style outside. This two-tone pattern of white and steel grey is so versatile and can be effectively teamed with a range of colours to create your desired look.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: When you want something decidedly neutral and contemporary, this handsome design will work perfectly. The easy stone colour is ideal to blend with subtle dcor and the generous curvy modern double-sided leaf pattern is a timeless choice. A high-quality finish that is flame retardant; boheme pvc blackout stone grey roller blind is crafted out of a special blackout fabric so light won't travel into your room when closed.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Azure Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, boheme pvc blackout azure blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it wont let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Willow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: The boheme willow double sided blackout electric roller blind boasts a host of practical features combined with an eye-catching contemporary look that will enhance your home and your lifestyle. The wipe-clean, blackout fabric can be raised and lowered at the touch of a button and is printed on both sides with a striking pattern of leaves on an earthy green background. This colour is so versatile and totally on-trend and would look at home in any room.
